projects.title: Hyprboard
projects.description: A open source, customizeable developement board. that runs on the RP2040 microprocessor.

projects.title: Sable Shell
projects.description: sable is a lightweight Unix-style shell written in C. It supports executing external commands, basic built-ins (cd, exit), and displays a colorized prompt showing your username and current working directory.

projects.title: Verses
projects.description: A Quran App built using Kotlin.
